content:
Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a stone sword I need to craft warped planks and sticks. To craft warped planks, I need to place the stripped warped hyphae in the crafting table. The stripped warped hyphae is in slot 30, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: The warped planks have been crafted, and I will now move them to the inventory (eg., slot 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: I need to craft a stick in order to craft a stone_sword. To do so, I need to place a warped plank in the crafting grid. The warped plank is located at slot 11, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: I need to craft a stick in order to craft a stone_sword. To do so, I need to place a jungle plank in the crafting grid. The jungle plank is located at slot 36, so I will move it to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}]
thought: I have crafted a stick in slot 0, so I will move it to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}]
thought: To craft a stone_sword, I need to place a stick in the middle slot, and two pieces of blackstone or cobblestone on top. Therefore I will move one of the cobblestones from slot 28 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}]
thought: Next, I will move the blackstone from slot 16 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}]
thought: Finally, I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 7, completing the sword recipe.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}]
thought: The stone_sword has been crafted, so I will move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1
